simplesect.title: Example of JDBCSender configuration
simplesect.programlisting: ... <sender class="JDBCSender"> <property name="target" value="jdbc:postgresql://127.0.0.1:5432/database"/> <property name="username" value="me-the-first"/> <property name="password" value="guess_me"/> <property name="driverClass" value="org.postgresql.Driver"/> ... </sender> ...
